name: Fix It Through Time
description:
A puzzle platformer in which player travels not only places but also 'time' "repair"ing his fate.

This game was made during Global Game Jam 2020 at Pune site.

Credits:
Team Leader / Code - Shirious
Concept/ Code - Rehaan Dafedar
Art - Rafhan Dafedar
Music - Kai Engel - Downfall (https://www.kai-engel.com/)
